model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.
Sounds like you had a great time! Which city did you visit?
It was Chicago. I had never been before, but it exceeded all my expectations.
I bet it was a nice change of scenery from our neighborhood.
Definitely. But you know, it's interesting how much our neighborhood has grown on me over the years. I remember when I first moved here, I was so unsure about it.
Yeah, I remember. But you stayed because you wanted to be here.
That's right. And since then, I've made so many great memories here. It's become my home.
And you're still spending time with God every day, right?
Yes, I am. It brings me so much peace and happiness.
That's really admirable. And speaking of power, I remember you telling me about that time when you could make me do anything you wanted.
Oh, gosh. That was so long ago. I can't even believe I had that kind of power over you.
I'm just glad we've both grown since then, and we can have a friendship that's based on mutual respect.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Spending time with God', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A shares the benefits of spending time with God daily, bringing peace and gratitude into their life.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: I love spending time with God every day. It makes me feel peaceful and happy. ### Neighbors B: That's interesting. What kind of activities do you do during that time? ### Neighbors A: I usually start with prayer and then read some passages from the Bible. Sometimes I listen to worship music too. ### Neighbors B: I see. That sounds like a nice routine. Do you feel like it has brought positive changes to your life? ### Neighbors A: Absolutely. It helps me stay focused and calm throughout the day. Plus, it's a great reminder to be thankful for all the blessings in my life.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Adjusting perspectives and practicing gratitude', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A emphasizes the importance of focusing on positive things and practicing gratitude to shift perspectives.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Yes, I totally understand. But focusing on positive things really helps shift your perspective. It's like the saying, "count your blessings, not your problems.' }(3) {'Related Topics': 'Finding comfort in routines and surroundings', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A expresses comfort and peace in their routine of spending time with God and living in the same place.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: Definitely. And speaking of comfort and peace, living in the same place has brought me a lot of comfort too. ### Neighbors B: I remember you telling me that. It's nice to have a place that feels like home. ### Neighbors A: Yes, it really is. And I'm grateful to have neighbors like you who make it feel even more like home.' }
```
